about_the_game:
Ninja Origin – Ninja Origin
The quintessence of the MMORPG role-playing game series

“Legendary Ninja – Ninja Origin” is an extremely attractive MMORPG role-playing game with deep gameplay. When participating in the game, players are transformed into shinobi to destroy demons to protect their villagers.
1. The game has HD graphics customized for each machine configuration with optimal capacity, cross-platform compatibility and diverse devices.
2. Own unique and familiar gameplay:
- Freedom to trade in the game: Can trade freely between gold and silver, unlocked items.
- Inheriting the quintessence from NSO, NRO, Konoha... and always listening to players' opinions to complete the community game.
- The Clan system supports players to unite and develop together with clan stock, clan skills and benefits from clan territory, clan practice area.
- No Combat Power, no VIP level: The strength and weakness of the character depends entirely on the attributes of the equipment, the contrasting sects and the player's controllability. The game has 5 character class systems developed according to the five elements system with mutual compatibility, thereby giving players a variety of development directions and character customization.
- Item Forging system has a chance to own special attributes for equipment and engrave the maker's name on the equipment.
- Intense PK and PvP system, fighting "heat" with brothers all day long.
- Rich appearance: Disguise, mounts, pets, flying ... increase strength and create a personal appearance, class for you.
In addition, the game has many good features and other books waiting for you to discover. “Legendary Ninja – Ninja Origin” is expected to be a favorite and remarkable game of the gaming community in 2023.
